Test.Name: ptz6: Correct response
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT POSITION SPACE test when DUT return correct response.

Test.Name: No PanTiltSpeedSpace
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT POSITION SPACE test when DUT return node without PanTiltSpeedSpace.

Test.Name: Not generic PanTiltSpeedSpace
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT POSITION SPACE test when DUT return not generic PanTiltSpeedSpace.

Test.Name: Several nodes
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT POSITION SPACE test when DUT return several nodes.

Test.Name: Without range for PanTiltSpeedSpace
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT POSITION SPACE test when DUT return correct response.

Test.Name: Absolute Move is not supported
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT POSITION SPACE test when DUT return correct response. Features_277 in Features_2.xml

Test.Name: Only Continuous Move is supported
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT POSITION SPACE test when DUT return correct response. Features_293 in Features_2.xml

Test.Name: Absolute PanTilt is not supported
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT POSITION SPACE test when DUT return correct response when absolute pan tilt is not supported. Use Features.282 in Features_273.xml
